meanings.sent1: The cardio surgeon performed a successful heart operation.
meanings.sent2: She had a cardio check-up to monitor her heart health.
meanings.sent3: The cardio-themed party decorations were all heart-shaped.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was like a cardio rhythm, steady and strong.
meanings.sent5: The cardio workout made her heart beat faster and stronger.

meanings.definition: a type of exercise that raises your heart rate and helps improve cardiovascular health
meanings.sent1: Doing cardio exercises like running or cycling can boost your heart health.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys doing cardio at the gym to keep her heart strong.
meanings.sent3: The cardio class was so intense, it felt like her heart was racing a marathon.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to cardio was like a daily dose of love for his heart.
meanings.sent5: The cardio routine was like a dance for her heart, moving to a healthy beat.
